Chemicals.description: Chemicals are a class of natural and synthetic compounds with industrial, agricultural, and scientific applications.
Chemicals.whereToFind: Chemicals can be sourced from refinery, agricultural and high tech systems.

Consumer Items.description: Consumer Items are goods created for human comfort and basic survival.
Consumer Items.whereToFind: Consumer Items can be found for sale in industrial and high tech systems.

Foods.description: Foods are organic products harvested from flora and fauna for human consumption.
Foods.whereToFind: Food is produced primarily by agricultural systems, but some specific items are produced in industrial and high tech systems.

Industrial Materials.description: Industrial Materials are refined products used in the manufacture of machinery, ships, and structures.
Industrial Materials.whereToFind: Industrial Materials are produced in refinery systems.

Legal Drugs.description: Drugs are substances that alter the mind and body, and can be legally traded at most markets.
Legal Drugs.whereToFind: Drugs can be found for sale in a wide range of agricultural and industrial systems. Not all drugs are legal in all locations.

Machinery.description: Machinery is used wide variety of important functions, from producing clean water to providing power to regulating heat output.
Machinery.whereToFind: Machinery can be purchased from industrial systems.

Medicines.description: Medicines are substances and compounds used to treat illnesses and improve health.
Medicines.whereToFind: Most medicines can be found in high tech systems, basic medicines are produced in industrial systems.

Metals.description: Metals are malleable and ductile substances that are important to the manufacture of everything from electronics to ship hulls.
Metals.whereToFind: Metals can be purchased in extration and refinery systems, or mined from suitable asteroids belts or planetary rings.

Minerals.description: Minerals are chemical compounds that are mined from naturally-occurring deposits and can be refined into other substances.
Minerals.whereToFind: Some minerals can be purchased in extration and refinery systems, some can only be mined from suitable asteroids.

Salvage.description: Salvage includes items that can be turned into Search and Rescue contacts in stations, as well as illegal goods and stolen cargo.
Salvage.whereToFind: Salvage items can be obtained from wreckage, abandoned structures, or be of alien origin.

Slavery.description: Slavery is illegal in most inhabited systems.
Slavery.whereToFind: Imperial Slavery, a regulated form of indentured servitude, is legal in Empire controlled systems.

Technology.description: Technology commodities include tools, components and equipment, often with highly-specialised applications.
Technology.whereToFind: Technology goods can be purchased primarily from high tech systems, some components can be sourced from industrial systems.

Textiles.description: Textiles are materials made of interlacing fibres and are are primarily used in the manufacture of clothing and furnishings.
Textiles.whereToFind: Natural materials can be sourced from agricultural systems, while sythentic materials are produced in industrial systems.

Waste.description: Waste is generated through the production and consumption of materials and commodities.
Waste.whereToFind: Waste is commonly produced by a wide range of systems.

Weapons.description: Weapons are tools designed and utilised for combat and defensive purposes, they are strictly regulated in most systems.
Weapons.whereToFind: Weapons can be found for sale in high tech systems, but they can be illegal to trade.
